meanings.definition: Having a shape that is partially round.
meanings.sent1: The cake had a semiround top layer.
meanings.sent2: The moon is a semiround shape in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The semiround cookies looked like little hills on the plate.
meanings.sent4: Her semiround face lit up with a smile.
meanings.sent5: The semiround table fit perfectly in the corner of the room.

meanings.definition: To make something partially round in shape.
meanings.sent1: She tried to semiround the edges of the paper.
meanings.sent2: The potter semirounded the clay to form a bowl.
meanings.sent3: He semirounded the snowball before throwing it playfully.
meanings.sent4: The gardener semirounded the bush to give it a softer look.
meanings.sent5: The artist semirounded the sculpture to create a unique design.
